headline: Twenty Companies, In My Opinion, Facing Existential AI Disruption Risk
summary: AI is reshaping industries, driving the 'human plus AI' revolution. Companies that fail to embrace change with objectivity risk becoming cautionary tales. See more.

headline: Levelpath Named a 2025 Gartner® Cool Vendor™ for Sourcing and Procurement Technology
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, August 21, 2025--Levelpath, the AI-native procurement platform, today announced it has been named as a Cool Vendor in Sourcing and Procurement Technology by Gartner®.
